{{cpp/chrono/tzdb/title|locate_zone}}
{{cpp/chrono/tzdb/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
const std::chrono::time_zone* locate_zone( std::string_view tz_name ) const;
}}

Obtains a pointer to a {{lc|std::chrono::time_zone}} in this database that represents the time zone designated by {{c|tz_name}}. If {{c|p}} is the returned pointer, then either {{c|1=p-&gt;name() == tz_name}} or that there is a {{lc|std::chrono::time_zone_link}} {{c|l}} in this database such that {{c|1=p-&gt;name() == l.target() &amp;&amp; l.name() == tz_name}}.

===Return value===
A pointer to the {{lc|std::chrono::time_zone}} in this database that represents the time zone designated by {{c|tz_name}}.

===Exceptions===
Throws {{lc|std::runtime_error}} if no such {{tt|time_zone}} can be found.
